name: io.github.comet-ml/opik-mcp
description: Interact with Opik prompts, traces, and metrics through the Model Context Protocol.

runtimeArguments.description: Automatically confirm npm prompts when installing.
runtimeArguments.name: -y

environmentVariables.description: API key from your Opik workspace for authenticating SDK calls.
environmentVariables.name: OPIK_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Override the API base URL when using a self-hosted Opik deployment.
environmentVariables.name: OPIK_API_BASE_URL

environmentVariables.description: Default workspace to scope prompt and trace operations.
environmentVariables.name: OPIK_WORKSPACE_NAME
